大合唱 |作曲= 斯蒂芬·施瓦茨，汉斯·季默 |作词= 斯蒂芬·施瓦茨 |填词= |编曲= |MV编导= |收录专辑= 《埃及王子》 }} 《'''Deliver Us'''》是动画《埃及王子》的[[片头曲]]。 == 简介 == 这是片中最长的一首曲子，长达7分15秒，全曲分为合唱段和独唱段，合唱段气势恢宏，独唱段则充满了温情。 == 歌曲 == {{music163|id=5055410}} == 歌词 == {{LyricsKai|lstyle=color:blue;|rstyle=color:orange; |original= Mud, sand, water, straw, faster Mud, and lift, sand, and pull Water, and raise up, straw, faster With the sting of the whip on my shoulder With the salt of my sweat on my brow Elohim, God on high Can you hear your people cry?
